title: STAT+: Vertex’s CRISPR treatment for sickle cell disease hits unexpected roadblock
description: Vertex is running out of time to establish Casgevy as a transformative treatment for sickle cell.
content: Vertex is running out of time to establish Casgevy as a transformative treatment for sickle cell.
